评论详情: I live in arizona, so the weight of this garment is great  It can be worn fall till spring. The stripes line up perfectly. The quality of construction is good. Perfect for a runabout outfit. It washed up well and has become a go-to outfit.

Just received this set yesterday. The material is super soft with almost a silky feel. Love the jacket, the pants are a bit more wide legged than I prefer but will probably keep it. The material feels really great.  Very luxurious.  The fit is fine.  Quite standard.  I wish it came in petite size so i didn't have to hem my pants.  I didn't pay attention to the waist band.  It's thicker than I would like it. But the only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is that the jacket had no pockets!!!!! THAT is weird.  A tracksuit is meant to be versatile activewear.  How can the jacket have no pockets?!  I was shocked when I realized it had no pockets.  If I hadn't already cut off the tags and hemmed the pants, I might have returned the item.  That was disappointing.

Nice combo and I had a coupon so great price.  That being said, the color in dark gray is not at all charcoal, but more of a deep mouse gray with taupe undertones.  I'm 5'7", regularly a size16, and I got the XL.  It fits very loosely and as expected. The biggest issue is that the pants are an inch too short and graze the tops of my shoes.  The jacket is a shorter style, as depicted.  The zipper is substantial, and the item is well-constructed.  The fabric is lightweight, very soft and feels nice next to the skin. This set machine washes and dries beautifully.  No iron was needed. Great set for the gym, around the house, running casual errands, layering during cool weather. 评论概述: Comfortable, cute and soft but construction issues. Works well over plaster splint and air cast.
评论详情: 2 Piece Sets for Women Fall Outfits Contrast Striped Long Sleeve Zip-Up Sweatshirt Wide Leg Pants Sweat Suit Going Out Athletic Loungewear Grey Blue M  This is a very cute lounge set made from a soft and cozy material. The pockets are deep and the wide waistband is very comfortable and is tacked down in two places in the front to minimize shifting. The inseam on the medium is about 29.5".  My concerns surround the construction of both the jacket and the bottoms. The striping is irregularly placed, with parts of it being squiggly and other sections fairly straight. Additionally, the seams seem to be irregular and has loose and tangled threads on both the inside and outside.  That said, I ordered this while in a plaster splint following a car accident and I'm currently using an air cast. The wide leg bottoms slipped right over my splint and also fit well over my air cast. Finding pants that fit and weren't painful to get on has been a frustrating and costly experience. so I will absolutely
This is very cute and comfortable. Great for lounge wear and for running errands. Definitely like it a lot.

评论概述: Cute casual jogger set! Well constructed, feels great on skin, runs true to size.
评论详情: This is a nice jogger set - material composition feels nice on skin, the set is well constructed, and the right amount of thickness. Runs true to size (if not large per nature of jogger sets). I wouldn't necessarily wear this out, but it's great for around the house. I picked this up for just under $50 which is slightly overpriced, IMO. Otherwise, if you are looking for a jogger set, this is it!
Not as heavy as I thought it would be which is really nice. Very comfortable, the material is soft and I love the pants, I wish they were sold separately. I may order another set.

This looks like an @did@s knockoff and is not bad, overall. The material is a little thinner than I thought it would be, but it's the kind of material that will keep you warm in the winter. I didn't find it especially breathable, though, on these warm, summer evenings.  The pants look cute and have SUPER wide leg, which I love. The jacket + pants is just too matchy matchy for me, so I wear them separate. The jacket looks sporty, so I don't wear it often, and it's just like a light layering jacket. I ordered my usual size and everything fit just fine, so I recommend sticking with whatever size you usually get.

The pants are big, the top is small. It is a very strange fit. The top seems almost cropped except the arms are not. The pants fit me great because they are the size I ordered but I will not be wearing the top. The material is okay but I have not washed them yet so I can not comment on that.

It's strange because this was vacuum sealed, but when opened the material was damp and smelled of mildew pretty badly. Ran it through the wash and all is good now. I have a daughter who is skinny like this and can pull off the look, so she is using it and likes it. The material is very soft and warm, so having something underneath so it can be unzipped is ideal. I think this will be a wonderful fall outfit that allows flexibility in how warm you want to be.

This is a fun and really cute take on the traditional sweatpants or jogger suit. The wide leg bottoms ad a bit of sass and fashion to the getup. And for some, this will be the best thing that could have EVER happened to a sweatsuit as many people really don’t like wearing clingy or tight clothes, especially to work out and sweat in. Me? I love this for a lounge outfit, an errand running get up, as well as a cute option to work out and sweat in. Its quality made. The fabric is really nice and thick- but not too thick that it will cause one to swelter from over heating. It’s just a nicely made, cute and quality two piece set.
